data.eml:eml: A new species of Lathrolestes (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae) from Ecuadorian Amazonia, with a key to the Neotropical species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reshchikov, Alexey, Veijalainen, Anu, Saeaeksjaerv, Ilari E. (2012): A new species of Lathrolestes (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae) from Ecuadorian Amazonia, with a key to the Neotropical species of the genus. ZooKeys 251: 21-27, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.251.3709, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.251.3709
